title:
HOW TO FIX IT
Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Combine ground beef, hot pepper sauce, onion, honey, garlic salt, red pepper flakes and black pepper into large bowl; mix well. Divide into 6 portions; form into patties around the 6 pieces of blue cheese. Grill 8-10 minutes or until done. Place burger on bun, top with roasted red peppers and portabella mushrooms.
directions: Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Combine ground beef, hot pepper sauce, onion, honey, garlic salt, red pepper flakes and black pepper into large bowl; mix well. Divide into 6 portions; form into patties around the 6 pieces of blue cheese. Grill 8-10 minutes or until done. Place burger on bun, top with roasted red peppers and portabella mushrooms.
ingredients: 6 oz. blue cheese, cut into 6 pieces
